what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: PROTOTYPE. USE goal sparsevctrs provide sparse vector class compatible tibbles.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: can install development version sparsevctrs like :

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
code: library(sparsevctrs)  x <- new_sparse_vector(4, 7, 10)  x #> <sparse_vector[10]> #>  [1] 0 0 0 0 0 0 4 0 0 0 sum(x) #> [1] 4  new_sparse_vector(4, 7, 10) + new_sparse_vector(3, 2, 10) #> <sparse_vector[10]> #>  [1] 0 3 0 0 0 0 4 0 0 0 library(tibble)  tibble(x = sample(1:10), y = new_sparse_vector(1, 7, 10)) #> # A tibble: 10 × 2 #>        x       y #>    <int> <spvtr> #>  1    10       0 #>  2     6       0 #>  3     5       0 #>  4     4       0 #>  5     1       0 #>  6     8       0 #>  7     2       1 #>  8     7       0 #>  9     9       0 #> 10     3       0

title: Create sparse numeric vector — new_sparse_real
text: value Numeric vector, values non-zero entries. position integer vector, indices non-zero entries. length Integer, Length vector.

title: Create new sparse vector — new_sparse_vector
text: values Vector values positions Vector positions, must integers length values. length Length resulting vector
